name: Woodland Retreat
description: Campers stay in cozy cabins nestled within the woods. They can create art surrounded by the beauty of nature and forest trails.

name: Mountain Adventure
description: High up in the mountains, campers experience art and craft activities in an alpine setting. The breathtaking views enhance their creativity.

name: Rustic Farm Experience
description: Immerse in farm life while exploring arts and crafts. Campers interact with animals and create art using natural farm materials.

name: Lakeside Oasis
description: Set by the serene lake, this campsite offers art sessions with a waterfront view. Kids can enjoy crafting while feeling the gentle breeze.
